name: places/ChIJa64uO-dYwokRbgRyowGAeSo
formattedAddress: 435 E 57th St, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 435 E 57th St, New York, NY 10022-3174, USA

originalText.text:
This is a follow up review.  As a result of Lango's incompetence of not diagnosing my injury properly I have constant ankle pain.  The scar tissue that resulted due to his improper and old fashioned treatment could not be fixed despite three subsequent surgeries.  He didn't know anything about state of the art medical treatment.

Anyone who goes to Lango (he should not have the Dr. before or MD after his name) is asking for horror.  BTW, his dental wife can spew so horrific insults.

originalText.text: He saved my wife's ankle from a very bad injury, when everybody else just recommended a complicated surgery. He was the only one recomemding patience and rest, and he was right, it took longer, but it did heal naturally!... Phenomenal doctor!...

text.text: He saved my wife's ankle from a very bad injury, when everybody else just recommended a complicated surgery. He was the only one recomemding patience and rest, and he was right, it took longer, but it did heal naturally!... Phenomenal doctor!...

originalText.text:
I have been seeing Dr. Lango for several years now for back problems caused from a broken back many years ago. After seeing doctor after doctor for 25 yeas and getting no results I have finally found someone who can and has helped me.

He is kind and will spend time talking to you and explaining things to you. Something you don't find often in a doctor these days

I have sent other friends and family members to him and every one of them has high praise.

originalText.text:
Horrible....just horrible.

Receptionist was rude.  Charges $150 just to say hi.  Didn't even really do anything except said to come back if it still hurts.  Called to come back (because it still hurts) and she said "sure....for another $150.  Why?  So you can just tell me the same thing.  I would rather spend $300 the first time and actually get service.

originalText.text: A friend of mine went to Dr. Lango and provided him with inserts that solved his problem.  Has nothing but nice things to say about him.
